body:
Comment 4: 
This is because of the way godoc is deployed to App Engine. The image files (and pdfs,
and some other file types) are served by App Engine's static file system, and are
therefore not visible to the godoc app. This is something I need to fix in my deployment
script, and is not a Go1.1 issue.
_Labels changed: removed **go1.1**._ _Owner changed to @adg._
